response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it is worth more than $1,200,000 to us. However, to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,400,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to excellence. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1400000}
